name: Cloud Hunter
description:
UNSTABLE: The water in the city is being drained all the time.

Save our city!

The history begins in a desolate city, where water is scarce and humanity is in ruins. You must find rain cloud's in the sky and extract water directly from them.

You are a cloud hunter! Your objective is to collect clouds. But it won't be easy, enemies will try to stop you!

Controls:

W / UP: turn the plane clockwise

S / DOWN: turn the plane counterclockwise

MOUSE LEFT: shoot

MOUSE RIGHT: drop bomb

Collect the clouds and supply the city with the collected water!
